data.title: Brittany Murphy's Husband, Simon Monjack, Found Dead
data.meta_description: Simon Monjack was found dead in Los Angeles, just five months after his wife, actress Brittany Murphy, died from pneumonia and multiple drug intoxication.
data.text:
Simon Monjack was found dead in Los Angeles, just five months after his wife, actress Brittany Murphy, died from pneumonia and multiple drug intoxication.

People is reporting that Monjack, a British screenwriter, was discovered in his home on Sunday night and later declared dead, citing a report from the Los Angeles coroner’s office. There was no immediate word on the cause of death, although the Guardian is reporting Monjack suffered a heart attack.

Monjack was 38. His credits include writing 2006’s Factory Girl and 2001’s Two Days Nine Lives.
